channel.title: Charles Tang's Personal Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Charles Tang's Personal Portfolio

item.title: About me
item.description: I am a full-stack developer with experience in both front-end and back-end technologies. My experience spans a wide range of programming languages and frameworks, including Node.js, React.js, Vue.js, and Svelte for front-end development, as well as Golang, Java, and ColdFusion for backend development. In addition to my technical prowess, I have a keen interest in hiking and watching movies, which balances my professional life with outdoor adventure and cinematic exploration. I am currently focused on exploring new job opportunities, particularly in environments that value innovation, autonomy, and high-performing agile teams.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Send me a message at my email address or Submit a message with this form.
